top_stories.title: Why the operating room is ripe for AI, according to Akara
top_stories.description: There’s plenty of hype around AI and robots in healthcare, but the problem that’s actually costing hospitals money right now is operating room coordination. Two to four hours of OR time is lost every single day, not because of the surgeries themselves, but because of everything in between, from manual scheduling and coordination chaos to […]
top_stories.author: Russell Brandom, Theresa Loconsolo
top_stories.content: There’s plenty of hype around AI and robots in healthcare, but the problem that’s actually costing hospitals money right now is operating room coordination. top_stories.title: Kirby Medical Center Partners With Switchboard, MD to Automate Care
top_stories.description: Switchboard, MD is proud to announce a new enterprise partnership with Kirby Medical Center, a nationally-recognized critical access hospital based in Piatt County, Illinois. The organization selected Switchboard, MD to preserve and strengthen its service standards for care delivery and help advance the vision for greater access to care, operational excellence, and... The post Kirby Medical Center Partners With Switchboard, MD to Automate Care first appeared on AI-Tech Park.

top_stories.title: Inaugural report pioneered by AI Security Institute gives clearest picture yet of capabilities of most advanced AI
top_stories.description: The AI Security Institute's Frontier AI Trends Report, a public assessment of how the most advanced AI systems are evolving, draws on 2 years of testing AI capabilities in areas critical to innovation and security, including cyber, chemistry and biology.
top_stories.content: The AI Security Institute's Frontier AI Trends Report, a public assessment of how the most advanced AI systems are evolving, draws on 2 years of testing AI capabilities in areas critical to innovation and security, including cyber, chemistry and biology.

top_stories.title: Evaluating chain-of-thought monitorability
top_stories.description: OpenAI introduces a new framework and evaluation suite for chain-of-thought monitorability, covering 13 evaluations across 24 environments. Our findings show that monitoring a model’s internal reasoning is far more effective than monitoring outputs alone, offering a promising path toward scalable control as AI systems grow more capable.
top_stories.content: OpenAI introduces a new framework and evaluation suite for chain-of-thought monitorability, covering 13 evaluations across 24 environments. Our findings show that monitoring a model’s internal reasoning is far more effective than monitoring outputs alone, offering a promising path toward scalable control as AI systems grow more capable.

top_stories.title: John Carreyrou and other authors bring new lawsuit against six major AI companies
top_stories.description: These authors rejected Anthropic's class action settlement, arguing that "LLM companies should not be able to so easily extinguish thousands upon thousands of high-value claims at bargain-basement rates."
top_stories.author: Amanda Silberling
top_stories.content: These authors rejected Anthropic's class action settlement, arguing that "LLM companies should not be able to so easily extinguish thousands upon thousands of high-value claims at bargain-basement rates."
